instructions.step: Heat the butter in a medium saucepan. When it starts to foam, add the salad onions, garlic, 2 tsp pul biber and a pinch of salt; sweat for 4-5 minutes until soft. Meanwhile, peel and chop the potato.

Stir in the potato, then add the milk and stock. Bring just to the boil, then simmer for 10-12 minutes until the potato is tender. Add the sweetcorn and cook for 2 minutes to warm it through. Blend the soup until smooth; season.
Mix the remaining 1 tsp pul biber with the salad cheeese and herbs. Ladle the soup into bowls and top with the cheese and herb mixture.
